rcsb_branched_instance_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

rcsb_branched_instance_feature_summary.t.description: Type or category of the feature.

pdbx_entity_branch_descriptor.type.description: This data item contains the descriptor type.

rcsb_branched_entity_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

rcsb_branched_entity_feature_summary.typ.description: Type or category of the feature.

rcsb_binding_affinity.type.description: Binding affinity measurement given in one of the following types:  The concentration constants: IC50: the concentration of ligand that reduces enzyme activity by 50%;  EC50: the concentration of compound that generates a half-maximal response;  The binding constant:  Kd: dissociation constant;  Ka: association constant;  Ki: enzyme inhibition constant;  The thermodynamic parameters:  delta G: Gibbs free energy of binding (for association reaction);  delta H: change in enthalpy associated with a chemical reaction;  delta S: change in entropy associated with a chemical reaction.

rcsb_polymer_instance_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

rcsb_polymer_instance_feature_summary.ty.description: Type or category of the feature.

rcsb_nonpolymer_entity_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

rcsb_nonpolymer_entity_feature_summary.t.description: Type or category of the feature.

rcsb_polymer_entity_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

rcsb_polymer_entity_feature_summary.type.description: Type or category of the feature.

rcsb_chem_comp_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

rcsb_chem_comp_related.resource_name.description: The resource name for the related chemical reference.

rcsb_nonpolymer_instance_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

rcsb_nonpolymer_instance_feature_summary.description: Type or category of the feature.

rcsb_uniprot_annotation.type.description: A type or category of the annotation.

full_text.description: Use Full Text to search against multiple fields in the database.

pdbx_deposit_group.group_id.description: A unique identifier for a group of entries deposited as a collection.

rcsb_pubmed_container_identifiers.pubmed.description: UID assigned to each PubMed record.

rcsb_entry_container_identifiers.emdb_id.description:
List of EMDB identifiers for the 3D electron microscopy density maps
 used in the production of the structure model.
rcsb_entry_container_identifiers.emdb_id.display_name: EMDB ID(s) for Maps Used in Structure Modeling

rcsb_entry_container_identifiers.related.description:
List of EMDB identifiers for the 3D electron microscopy density maps
 related to the structure model.

rcsb_uniprot_protein.name.value.description: Name that allows to unambiguously identify a protein.

struct.title.description:
A title for the data block. The author should attempt to convey
 the essence of the structure archived in the CIF in the title,
 and to distinguish this structural result from others.
examples: Crystal structure of the OXA-10 W154A mutant at pH 9.0
Mutant structure of Thermus thermophilus HB8 uridine-cytidine kinase
Crystal structure of xylanase from Trichoderma longibrachiatum

struct.pdbx_descriptor.description:
An automatically generated descriptor for an NDB structure or
 the unstructured content of the PDB COMPND record.

audit_author.name.description:
The name of an author of this data block. If there are multiple
 authors, _audit_author.name is looped with _audit_author.address.
 The family name(s), followed by a comma and including any
 dynastic components, precedes the first name(s) or initial(s).

pdbx_SG_project.project_name.description: The value identifies the Structural Genomics project.
enumeration: NIAID, National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
NPPSFA, National Project on Protein Structural and Functional Analyses

pdbx_SG_project.initial_of_center.description: The value identifies the full name of center.

pdbx_SG_project.full_name_of_center.description: The value identifies the full name of center.
enumeration: Accelerated Technologies Center for Gene to 3D Structure
Assembly, Dynamics and Evolution of Cell-Cell and Cell-Matrix Adhesions
Center for Membrane Proteins of Infectious Diseases
Center for Structural Genomics of Infectious Diseases
Center for Structures of Membrane Proteins
Center for the X-ray Structure Determination of Human Transporters
Chaperone-Enabled Studies of Epigenetic Regulation Enzymes
Enzyme Discovery for Natural Product Biosynthesis
Integrated Center for Structure and Function Innovation
Medical Structural Genomics of Pathogenic Protozoa
Membrane Protein Structures by Solution NMR
New York Consortium on Membrane Protein Structure
New York SGX Research Center for Structural Genomics
New York Structural GenomiX Research Consortium
New York Structural Genomics Research Consortium
Nucleocytoplasmic Transport: a Target for Cellular Control
Partnership for Nuclear Receptor Signaling Code Biology
Program for the Characterization of Secreted Effector Proteins
Seattle Structural Genomics Center for Infectious Disease
South Africa Structural Targets Annotation Database
Structural Genomics Consortium for Research on Gene Expression
Structural Genomics of Pathogenic Protozoa Consortium
Structure, Dynamics and Activation Mechanisms of Chemokine Receptors
Structure-Function Analysis of Polymorphic CDI Toxin-Immunity Protein Complexes
Structure-Function Studies of Tight Junction Membrane Proteins
Structures of Mtb Proteins Conferring Susceptibility to Known Mtb Inhibitors
Transcontinental EM Initiative for Membrane Protein Structure

rcsb_accession_info.has_released_experim.description: A code indicating the current availibility of experimental data in the repository.

pdbx_database_status.pdb_format_compatib.description:
A flag indicating that the entry is compatible with the PDB format.

 A value of 'N' indicates that the no PDB format data file is
 corresponding to this entry is available in the PDB archive.

chem_comp.name.description: The full name of the component.

rcsb_chem_comp_synonyms.name.description: The synonym of this particular chemical component.

chem_comp.type.description:
For standard polymer components, the type of the monomer.
 Note that monomers that will form polymers are of three types:
 linking monomers, monomers with some type of N-terminal (or 5')
 cap and monomers with some type of C-terminal (or 3') cap.

rcsb_chem_comp_descriptor.InChIKey.description:
Standard IUPAC International Chemical Identifier (InChI) descriptor key
 for the chemical component

 InChI, the IUPAC International Chemical Identifier,
 by Stephen R Heller, Alan McNaught, Igor Pletnev, Stephen Stein and Dmitrii Tchekhovskoi,
 Journal of Cheminformatics, 2015, 7:23

chem_comp.formula_weight.description: Formula mass of the chemical component.

rcsb_chem_comp_related.resource_accessio.description: The resource identifier code for the related chemical reference.

rcsb_chem_comp_annotation.annotation_lin.description: Members of the annotation lineage as parent class names.
Members of the annotation lineage as parent class identifiers.

rcsb_entry_info.selected_polymer_entity_.description: Selected polymer entity type categories describing the entry.

rcsb_entry_info.polymer_composition.description: Categories describing the polymer entity composition for the entry.

rcsb_entry_info.molecular_weight.description: The molecular mass (KDa) of polymer and non-polymer entities (exclusive of solvent) in the deposited structure entry.

rcsb_entry_info.entity_count.description: The number of distinct polymer, non-polymer, branched molecular, and solvent entities per deposited structure model.

rcsb_entry_info.nonpolymer_entity_count.description: The number of distinct non-polymer entities in the structure entry exclusive of solvent.

rcsb_entry_info.polymer_entity_count_pro.description: The number of distinct protein polymer entities.

rcsb_entry_info.polymer_entity_count_RNA.description: The number of distinct RNA polymer entities.

rcsb_entry_info.polymer_entity_count_DNA.description: The number of distinct DNA polymer entities.

rcsb_entry_info.polymer_entity_count_nuc.description: The number of distinct hybrid nucleic acid polymer entities.
rcsb_entry_info.polymer_entity_count_nuc.display_name: Number of Distinct NA Hybrid Entities

rcsb_entry_info.deposited_polymer_entity.description:
The number of polymer instances in the deposited data set.
 This is the total count of polymer entity instances reported
 per deposited structure model.

rcsb_entry_info.deposited_nonpolymer_ent.description:
The number of non-polymer instances in the deposited data set.
 This is the total count of non-polymer entity instances reported
 per deposited structure model.

rcsb_entry_info.deposited_polymer_monome.description:
The number of polymer monomers in sample entity instances in the deposited data set.
 This is the total count of monomers for all polymer entity instances reported
 per deposited structure model.
rcsb_entry_info.deposited_polymer_monome.display_name: Total Number of Polymer Residues per Deposited Model

rcsb_entry_info.deposited_atom_count.description: The number of heavy atom coordinates records per deposited structure model.
rcsb_entry_info.deposited_atom_count.display_name: Number of Non-Hydrogen Atoms per Deposited Model

rcsb_entry_info.deposited_solvent_atom_c.description: The number of heavy solvent atom coordinates records per deposited structure model.
rcsb_entry_info.deposited_solvent_atom_c.display_name: Number of Water Molecules per Deposited Model

rcsb_entry_info.deposited_model_count.description: The number of model structures deposited.

rcsb_entry_info.disulfide_bond_count.description: The number of disulfide bonds per deposited structure model.
rcsb_entry_info.disulfide_bond_count.display_name: Disulfide Bond Count per Deposited Model

rcsb_polymer_entity.pdbx_description.description: A description of the polymer entity.

entity_poly.rcsb_sample_sequence_length.description: The monomer length of the sample sequence.

entity_poly.rcsb_mutation_count.description: Number of engineered mutations engineered in the sample sequence.

rcsb_polymer_struct_conn.role.description: The chemical or structural role of the interaction

rcsb_entity_source_organism.taxonomy_lin.description: Memebers of the NCBI Taxonomy lineage as parent taxonomy names.
Members of the NCBI Taxonomy lineage as parent taxonomy idcodes.

rcsb_polymer_entity.rcsb_source_part_cou.description:
The number of biological sources for the polymer entity. Multiple source contributions
 may come from the same organism (taxonomy).

rcsb_polymer_entity.rcsb_source_taxonomy.description: The number of distinct source taxonomies for the polymer entity. Commonly used to identify chimeric polymers.

rcsb_entity_host_organism.taxonomy_linea.description: Members of the NCBI Taxonomy lineage as parent taxonomy names.
Members of the NCBI Taxonomy lineage as parent taxonomy idcodes.

rcsb_polymer_entity.rcsb_ec_lineage.id.description: Members of the enzyme classification lineage as parent classification codes.

rcsb_polymer_entity.rcsb_ec_lineage.name.description: Members of the enzyme classification lineage as parent classification names.

rcsb_polymer_entity_annotation.annotatio.description: Members of the annotation lineage as parent class identifiers.
Members of the annotation lineage as parent class names.

rcsb_polymer_entity_feature_summary.cove.description: The fractional feature coverage relative to the full entity sequence.

rcsb_membrane_lineage.id.description: Automatically assigned ID for membrane classification term in the Membrane Protein Browser.
rcsb_membrane_lineage.id.placeholder: Example: MONOTOPIC MEMBRANE PROTEINS.Oxidases.Monoamine Oxidase A

rcsb_genomic_lineage.id.description: Automatically assigned ID that uniquely identifies taxonomy, chromosome or gene in the Genome Location Browser.

rcsb_polymer_instance_annotation.annotat.description: Members of the annotation lineage as parent class identifiers.
Members of the annotation lineage as parent class names.

rcsb_nonpolymer_entity_annotation.comp_i.description: Non-polymer(ligand) chemical component identifier for the entity.

rcsb_binding_affinity.value.description: Binding affinity value between a ligand and its target molecule.

pdbx_entity_branch.type.description: The type of this branched oligosaccharide.

rcsb_branched_entity.pdbx_description.description: A description of the branched entity.

rcsb_branched_entity.formula_weight.description: Formula mass (KDa) of the branched entity.

pdbx_entity_branch_descriptor.descriptor.description:
This data item contains the descriptor value for this
 entity.

pdbx_entity_branch.rcsb_branched_compone.description: Number of constituent chemical components in the branched entity.

rcsb_branched_entity_container_identifie.description: Unique list of monomer chemical component identifiers in the entity in this container.

rcsb_assembly_info.atom_count.description: The assembly non-hydrogen atomic coordinate count.
rcsb_assembly_info.atom_count.display_name: Number of Non-Hydrogen Atoms per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.solvent_atom_count.description: The assembly non-hydrogen solvent atomic coordinate count.
rcsb_assembly_info.solvent_atom_count.display_name: Number of Water Molecules per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_monomer_count.description:
The number of polymer monomers in sample entity instances comprising the assembly data set.
 This is the total count of monomers for all polymer entity instances
 in the generated assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_monomer_count.display_name: Number of Polymer Residues per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.modeled_polymer_monom.description:
The number of modeled polymer monomers in the assembly coordinate data.
 This is the total count of monomers with reported coordinate data for all polymer
 entity instances in the generated assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.modeled_polymer_monom.display_name: Number of Modeled Polymer Residues per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.unmodeled_polymer_mon.description:
The number of unmodeled polymer monomers in the assembly coordinate data. This is
 the total count of monomers with unreported coordinate data for all polymer
 entity instances in the generated assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.unmodeled_polymer_mon.display_name: Number of Unmodeled Polymer Residues per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.description:
The number of polymer instances in the generated assembly data set.
 This is the total count of polymer entity instances generated in the assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.display_name: Number of Polymer Instances (Chains) per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.nonpolymer_entity_ins.description:
The number of non-polymer instances in the generated assembly data set exclusive of solvent.
 This is the total count of non-polymer entity instances generated in the assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.nonpolymer_entity_ins.display_name: Number of Non-polymer Instances per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.description:
The number of protein polymer instances in the generated assembly data set.
 This is the total count of protein polymer entity instances generated in the assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.display_name: Number of Protein Instances (Chains) per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.description:
The number of DNA polymer instances in the generated assembly data set.
 This is the total count of DNA polymer entity instances generated in the assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.display_name: Number of DNA Instances (Chains) per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.description:
The number of RNA polymer instances in the generated assembly data set.
 This is the total count of RNA polymer entity instances generated in the assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.display_name: Number of RNA Instances (Chains) per Assembly

rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.description:
The number of hybrid nucleic acide polymer instances in the generated assembly data set.
 This is the total count of hybrid nucleic acid polymer entity instances generated in the assembly coordinate data.
rcsb_assembly_info.polymer_entity_instan.display_name: Number of NA Hybrid Instances (Chains) per Assembly

pdbx_struct_assembly_auth_evidence.exper.description: Provides the experimental method to determine the state of this assembly

pdbx_struct_assembly_auth_evidence.detai.description: Provides any additional information regarding the evidence of this assembly
examples: Helical filament was observed by negative staining and Cryo-EM

rcsb_struct_symmetry.symbol.description: Symmetry symbol refers to point group or helical symmetry of identical polymeric subunits in Schnflies notation. Contains point group symbol (e.g., C2, C5, D2, T, O, I) or H for helical symmetry.

rcsb_struct_symmetry.oligomeric_state.description: Oligomeric state refers to a composition of polymeric subunits in quaternary structure. Quaternary structure may be composed either exclusively of several copies of identical subunits, in which case they are termed homo-oligomers, or alternatively by at least one copy of different subunits (hetero-oligomers). Quaternary structure composed of a single subunit is denoted as 'Monomer'.

rcsb_struct_symmetry.type.description: Symmetry type refers to point group or helical symmetry of identical polymeric subunits. Contains point group types (e.g. Cyclic, Dihedral) or Helical for helical symmetry.

rcsb_struct_symmetry.kind.description: The granularity at which the symmetry calculation is performed. In 'Global Symmetry' all polymeric subunits in assembly are used. In 'Local Symmetry' only a subset of polymeric subunits is considered. In 'Pseudo Symmetry' the threshold for subunits similarity is relaxed.

rcsb_struct_symmetry_lineage.id.description: Automatically assigned ID to uniquely identify the symmetry term in the Protein Symmetry Browser.

pdbx_reference_molecule.prd_id.description:
The value of _pdbx_reference_molecule.prd_id is the unique identifier
 for the reference molecule in this family.

 By convention this ID uniquely identifies the reference molecule in
 in the PDB reference dictionary.

 The ID has the template form PRD_dddddd (e.g. PRD_000001)

pdbx_reference_molecule.type.description: Defines the structural classification of the entity.

pdbx_reference_molecule.class.description: Broadly defines the function of the entity.

exptl.method.description: The method used in the experiment.

rcsb_entry_info.experimental_method.description: The category of experimental method(s) used to determine the structure entry.

rcsb_entry_info.experimental_method_coun.description: The number of experimental methods contributing data to the structure determination.

rcsb_entry_info.resolution_combined.description: Combined estimates of experimental resolution contributing to the refined structural model.

rcsb_entry_info.software_programs_combin.description: Combined list of software programs names reported in connection with the production of this entry.

refine.pdbx_method_to_determine_struct.description: Method(s) used to determine the structure.

refine.B_iso_mean.description:
The mean isotropic displacement parameter (B value)
 for the coordinate set.

refine.ls_R_factor_obs.description:
Residual factor R for reflections that satisfy the resolution
 limits established by _refine.ls_d_res_high and
 _refine.ls_d_res_low and the observation limit established by
 _reflns.observed_criterion.

 _refine.ls_R_factor_obs should not be confused with
 _refine.ls_R_factor_R_work; the former reports the results of a
 refinement in which all observed reflections were used, the
 latter a refinement in which a subset of the observed
 reflections were excluded from refinement for the calculation
 of a 'free' R factor. However, it would be meaningful to quote
 both values if a 'free' R factor were calculated for most of
 the refinement, but all of the observed reflections were used
 in the final rounds of refinement; such a protocol should be
 explained in _refine.details.

     sum|F~obs~ - F~calc~|
 R = ---------------------
          sum|F~obs~|

 F~obs~  = the observed structure-factor amplitudes
 F~calc~ = the calculated structure-factor amplitudes

 sum is taken over the specified reflections

refine.ls_R_factor_all.description:
Residual factor R for all reflections that satisfy the resolution
 limits established by _refine.ls_d_res_high and
 _refine.ls_d_res_low.

     sum|F~obs~ - F~calc~|
 R = ---------------------
          sum|F~obs~|

 F~obs~  = the observed structure-factor amplitudes
 F~calc~ = the calculated structure-factor amplitudes

 sum is taken over the specified reflections

refine.ls_R_factor_R_work.description:
Residual factor R for reflections that satisfy the resolution
 limits established by _refine.ls_d_res_high and
 _refine.ls_d_res_low and the observation limit established by
 _reflns.observed_criterion, and that were used as the working
 reflections (i.e. were included in the refinement)  when the
 refinement included the calculation of a 'free' R factor.
 Details of how reflections were assigned to the working and
 test sets are given in _reflns.R_free_details.

 _refine.ls_R_factor_obs should not be confused with
 _refine.ls_R_factor_R_work; the former reports the results of a
 refinement in which all observed reflections were used, the
 latter a refinement in which a subset of the observed
 reflections were excluded from refinement for the calculation
 of a 'free' R factor. However, it would be meaningful to quote
 both values if a 'free' R factor were calculated for most of
 the refinement, but all of the observed reflections were used
 in the final rounds of refinement; such a protocol should be
 explained in _refine.details.

     sum|F~obs~ - F~calc~|
 R = ---------------------
          sum|F~obs~|

 F~obs~  = the observed structure-factor amplitudes
 F~calc~ = the calculated structure-factor amplitudes

 sum is taken over the specified reflections

refine.ls_R_factor_R_free.description:
Residual factor R for reflections that satisfy the resolution
 limits established by _refine.ls_d_res_high and
 _refine.ls_d_res_low and the observation limit established by
 _reflns.observed_criterion, and that were used as the test
 reflections (i.e. were excluded from the refinement) when the
 refinement included the calculation of a 'free' R factor.
 Details of how reflections were assigned to the working and
 test sets are given in _reflns.R_free_details.

     sum|F~obs~ - F~calc~|
 R = ---------------------
          sum|F~obs~|

 F~obs~  = the observed structure-factor amplitudes
 F~calc~ = the calculated structure-factor amplitudes

 sum is taken over the specified reflections

refine.details.description: Description of special aspects of the refinement process.
examples: HYDROGENS HAVE BEEN ADDED IN THE RIDING POSITIONS
refine.details.placeholder: Example: HYDROGENS HAVE BEEN ADDED IN THE RIDING POSITIONS

rcsb_entry_info.diffrn_resolution_high.v.description: The high resolution limit of data collection.

reflns.B_iso_Wilson_estimate.description:
The value of the overall isotropic displacement parameter
 estimated from the slope of the Wilson plot.

reflns.pdbx_redundancy.description: Overall redundancy for this data set (%).

reflns.percent_possible_obs.description:
The percentage of geometrically possible reflections represented
 by reflections that satisfy the resolution limits established
 by _reflns.d_resolution_high and _reflns.d_resolution_low and
 the observation limit established by
 _reflns.observed_criterion.

reflns.pdbx_Rmerge_I_obs.description:
The R value for merging intensities satisfying the observed
 criteria in this data set.

diffrn_detector.type.description: The make, model or name of the detector device used.

diffrn.ambient_temp.description:
The mean temperature in kelvins at which the intensities were
 measured.

rcsb_entry_info.diffrn_radiation_wavelen.description: The minimum radiation wavelength in angstroms.
The maximum radiation wavelength in angstroms.

cell.length_a.description:
Unit-cell length a corresponding to the structure reported in
angstroms.

cell.length_b.description:
Unit-cell length b corresponding to the structure reported in
 angstroms.

cell.length_c.description:
Unit-cell length c corresponding to the structure reported in
angstroms.

cell.angle_alpha.description: Unit-cell angle alpha of the reported structure in degrees.

cell.angle_beta.description: Unit-cell angle beta of the reported structure in degrees.

cell.angle_gamma.description: Unit-cell angle gamma of the reported structure in degrees.

symmetry.space_group_name_H_M.description:
Hermann-Mauguin space-group symbol. Note that the
 Hermann-Mauguin symbol does not necessarily contain complete
 information about the symmetry and the space-group origin. If
 used, always supply the FULL symbol from International Tables
 for Crystallography Vol. A (2002) and indicate the origin and
 the setting if it is not implicit. If there is any doubt that
 the equivalent positions can be uniquely deduced from this
 symbol, specify the  _symmetry_equiv.pos_as_xyz or
 _symmetry.space_group_name_Hall  data items as well. Leave
 spaces between symbols referring to
 different axes.

exptl_crystal.density_Matthews.description:
The density of the crystal, expressed as the ratio of the
 volume of the asymmetric unit to the molecular mass of a
 monomer of the structure, in units of angstroms^3^ per dalton.

 Ref: Matthews, B. W. (1968). J. Mol. Biol. 33, 491-497.

exptl_crystal.density_percent_sol.description:
Density value P calculated from the crystal cell and contents,
 expressed as per cent solvent.

 P = 1 - (1.23 N MMass) / V

 N     = the number of molecules in the unit cell
 MMass = the molecular mass of each molecule (gm/mole)
 V     = the volume of the unit cell (A^3^)
 1.23  = a conversion factor evaluated as:

         (0.74 cm^3^/g) (10^24^ A^3^/cm^3^)
         --------------------------------------
              (6.02*10^23^) molecules/mole

         where 0.74 is an assumed value for the partial specific
         volume of the molecule

exptl_crystal_grow.temp.description:
The temperature in kelvins at which the crystal was grown.
 If more than one temperature was employed during the
 crystallization process, the final temperature should be noted
 here and the protocol  involving multiple temperatures should be
 described in _exptl_crystal_grow.details.

exptl_crystal_grow.pH.description:
The pH at which the crystal was grown. If more than one pH was
 employed during the crystallization process, the final pH should
 be noted here and the protocol involving multiple pH values
 should be described in _exptl_crystal_grow.details.

exptl_crystal_grow.method.description: The method used to grow the crystals.

exptl_crystal_grow.pdbx_details.description: Text description of crystal growth procedure.
examples: PEG 4000, potassium phosphate, magnesium chloride, cacodylate
exptl_crystal_grow.pdbx_details.placeholder: Example: PEG 4000, potassium phosphate, magnesium chloride, cacodylate

em_3d_reconstruction.resolution.description: The final resolution (in Angstroms)of the 3D reconstruction.

em_experiment.aggregation_state.description: The aggregation/assembly state of the imaged specimen.

em_experiment.reconstruction_method.description: The reconstruction method used in the EM experiment.

em_software.name.description:
The name of the software package used, e.g., RELION.  Depositors are strongly
  encouraged to provide a value in this field.

em_vitrification.instrument.description: The type of instrument used in the vitrification process.

em_imaging.microscope_model.description: The name of the model of microscope.

em_imaging.accelerating_voltage.description: A value of accelerating voltage (in kV) used for imaging.

em_image_recording.film_or_detector_mode.description:
The detector type used for recording images.
 Usually film or CCD camera.

em_single_particle_entity.point_symmetry.description: Point symmetry symbol, either Cn, Dn, T, O, or I

pdbx_nmr_spectrometer.manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the spectrometer.

pdbx_nmr_spectrometer.model.description: The model of the NMR spectrometer.

pdbx_nmr_spectrometer.field_strength.description: Select the field strength for protons in MHz.

pdbx_nmr_refine.method.description: The method used to determine the structure.
examples:
distance geometry
  simulated annealing
  molecular dynamics
  matrix relaxation
  torsion angle dynamics

rcsb_primary_citation.rcsb_authors.description:
Names of the authors of the citation; relevant for journal
 articles, books and book chapters.  Names are separated by vertical bars.

 The family name(s), followed by a comma and including any
 dynastic components, precedes the first name(s) or initial(s).

rcsb_primary_citation.title.description:
The title of the citation; relevant for journal articles, books
 and book chapters.
examples:
Structure of diferric duck ovotransferrin
                                  at 2.35 Angstroms resolution.
rcsb_primary_citation.title.placeholder:
Example: Structure of diferric duck ovotransferrin
                                  at 2.35 Angstroms resolution.

rcsb_primary_citation.year.description:
The year of the citation; relevant for journal articles, books
 and book chapters.

rcsb_primary_citation.pdbx_database_id_D.description:
Document Object Identifier used by doi.org to uniquely
 specify bibliographic entry.

rcsb_pubmed_abstract_text.description: A concise, accurate and factual mini-version of the paper contents.

citation.rcsb_authors.description:
Names of the authors of the citation; relevant for journal
 articles, books and book chapters.  Names are separated by vertical bars.

 The family name(s), followed by a comma and including any
 dynastic components, precedes the first name(s) or initial(s).

citation.title.description:
The title of the citation; relevant for journal articles, books
 and book chapters.
examples:
Structure of diferric duck ovotransferrin
                                  at 2.35 Angstroms resolution.
citation.title.placeholder:
Example: Structure of diferric duck ovotransferrin
                                  at 2.35 Angstroms resolution.

citation.year.description:
The year of the citation; relevant for journal articles, books
 and book chapters.

citation.pdbx_database_id_DOI.description:
Document Object Identifier used by doi.org to uniquely
 specify bibliographic entry.

pdbx_deposit_group.group_type.description: Text to describe a grouping of entries in multiple collections

rcsb_entity_host_organism.ncbi_scientifi.description:
The scientific name associated with this taxonomy code aggregated by the NCBI Taxonomy Database.

  This name corresponds to the taxonomy identifier assigned by the PDB depositor.


References:
